author: Jordan Sirani
description: All 18 LEGO games released for the Nintendo Switch between 2017 and 2025, from original LEGO worlds to collaborations with Fortnite.
title: Every LEGO Game on the Nintendo Switch in 2025

author: Eric Song
description: Ships from a local US warehouse so you don't have to worry about tariffs.
title: Get a 1,000W Electric Bike for Adults for as Low as $276 During the AliExpress Black Friday Sale

author: Noah Hunter
description: Every Zelda game you can check out on the Nintendo Switch, plus the new upgrades, games, and features coming to the Switch 2.
title: Every Legend of Zelda Game on the Nintendo Switch in 2025

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: A brand new Rachet & Clank game just got announced, but sorry folks, it's not a new PS5 adventure. It's called Rachet & Clank: Ranger Rumble, and it's coming to mobile sometime soon.
title: A New Ratchet & Clank Game Was Just Announced...for Mobile

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: The New York Videogame Critics Circle has unveiled the winner of its annual Andrew Yoon Legend Award ahead of the New York Game Awards in January. And unlike past years, it's not going to an individual luminary from the video game industry. It's going to...the Pokémon franchise.
title: New York Videogame Critics Circle's Annual Legend Award Won't Go to a Person This Year; It's Going to Pokémon

author: Eric Song
description: Rare savings on IGN's best rated gaming chairs.
title: The Secretlab Early Black Friday Sale Starts Now, Time to Upgrade to a Premium Gaming Chair

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: 2025 truly is the year of Marvel/DC crossovers, with the two publishers shadow-dropping new The Flash/Fantastic Four and Thor/SHAZAM comics.
title: Marvel and DC Join Forces Again for The Flash/Fantastic Four and Thor/SHAZAM! Crossovers

author: Eric Song
description: A compilation of every Calvin and Hobbes cartoon that ever appeared in syndication.
title: The Complete Calvin and Hobbes Hardcover Book Set Is on Sale Ahead of Black Friday

author: Lex Briscuso
description: They’re back — and it looks like they’re better than ever. 20th Century Studios has just released the first teaser trailer for The Devil Wears Prada 2, and the sneak peek gives fans their very first look at Meryl Streep’s Miranda Priestly and Anne Hathaway’s Andy Sachs all these years after the original 2006 hit film.
title: The Devil Wears Prada 2 Teaser Trailer Gives Fans First Look at Meryl Streep and Anne Hathaway Reunited as Their Iconic Characters

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Mondo is kicking off a new line of collector-oriented TMNT figures, and it might just be the coolest Donatello toy we've ever seen.
title: Mondo Teases One of the Coolest TMNT Figures We've Ever Seen

author: Michael Higham
description: The new Steam Controller combines the full gamepad experience with premium features like TMR sticks, motion controls, capacitive sensors, trackpads, and four programmable back buttons.
title: Steam Controller Preview – Hands-On With Valve's Reinvented PC Gaming Controller

author: Michael Higham
description: Ultra-fast wireless tethering and a built-in Snapdragon ARM processor make the Steam Frame one of the most versatile and interesting VR gaming headsets thus far.
title: Steam Frame Preview – Hands-On With Valve's State-of-the-Art VR Headset

author: Jacqueline Thomas
description: Valve’s newest hardware aims to further bridge the gap between gaming PCs and consoles.
title: Steam Machine Hands-On: First Impressions of Valve’s New Console-Like Gaming PC

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Valve has announced a return to its Steam Machine PC / console hybrid hardware alongside a new version of the Steam Controller.
title: Valve Announces Next-Gen Steam Machine, Says It's 'Over 6x More Powerful Than Steam Deck,' but There's No Price Yet

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Valve has announced a next-gen virtual reality headset, dubbed Steam Frame.
title: Valve Announces Steam Frame, Its Next-Gen VR Headset

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
title: Valve Heads Into VR Headset Hardware Once Again With Steam Frame — the Big Interview

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Valve announced three new devices today: the Steam Frame, the new Steam Machine, and the new Steam Controller. But where’s the Steam Deck 2? In a new interview with IGN, Valve explains why it's still holding off.
title: Valve Says It Has a 'Pretty Good Idea' of What Steam Deck 2 Is Going to Be, Explains Why It's Holding Off for Now

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Valve has announced three new products: the next-gen Steam Machine, the next-gen Steam Controller, and Steam Frame, its next-gen virtual reality headset. It’s a huge day for the company behind Half-Life and its fans, with lots to digest. So, we’ve rounded up everything Valve announced today and all our exclusive coverage so you can sink your teeth into Valve’s hardware plans.
title: Valve's Next-Gen Hardware Lineup Is Finally Confirmed — Here's Everything Announced

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Steam Machine is back, and with it comes a new Steam Controller! Ahead of the big reveal, IGN took a trip to Valve's headquarters to find out everything we could about both next-gen devices.
title: Valve's Next-Gen Steam Machine and Steam Controller — the Big Interview

author: Jacqueline Thomas
description: The next step in Valve’s play to become the face of PC gaming.
title: With the Steam Machine, Valve May Be Defining the Next Generation of Games

author: Christian Wait
description: Pokémon TCG ex Special Collection boxes are dropping at MSRP ($24.99) on Walmart tomorrow, Nov. 13, with five-hour early access for paid Walmart+ members. Walmart+ is half price until Dec. 2, making this the perfect time to sign up and secure your set. Plus, early Black Friday gaming deals are live across Xbox and PlayStation, with Elite Series 2 controllers $60 off, PS5 Pro consoles discounted, and top titles like Rise of the Ronin and Spider-Man: Miles Morales on sale.
title: Deals for Today: Pokémon TCG for MSRP and Early Black Friday Gaming Deals

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: We chat with the writer of Marvel's Predator: Badlands #1 to learn more about how director Dan Trachtenberg shaped this prequel story.
title: How Dan Trachtenberg Helped Shape Marvel's Predator: Badlands Prequel

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Get your popcorn early — and don’t forget to hit the bathroom pre-show. It looks like James Cameron’s next Avatar film, Avatar: Fire and Ash, will be clocking in over three hours long.
title: The Official Runtime For Avatar: Fire and Ash Is (You Guessed It) Extremely Long, So Strap In

author: Michael Cripe
description: Battlefield 6 is set to receive what could be its biggest update yet, including reverted aim assist and additional weapon bloom tweaks, as soon as November 18, as work on Season 1 continues.
title: Battlefield 6 Devs Outline Upcoming Aim Assist and Weapon Bloom Adjustments for What Could be the Biggest Update Yet

author: Tom Phillips
description: November's list of PlayStation Plus Game Catalog titles has been confirmed by Sony and, as expected, it includes a welcome return for Grand Theft Auto 5.
title: PlayStation Plus November Game Line-up Confirmed, Includes GTA 5

author: Cristina Alexander
description: Counting down the final games on the original Switch.
title: Upcoming Nintendo Switch Games: Release Dates for 2025 and Beyond

author: Christian Wait
description: Pokémon TCG’s Mega Lucario ex Figure Collection is up to 50% off right now for AMEX and Discover cardholders on Amazon or spend $1 or use a loyalty point to unlock the discount. Plus, new Amazon Store Card members get an instant $60 gift card, meaning you could grab this set for as little as $1.
title: Pokémon TCG: Mega Lucario ex Figure Collection Discounted at Amazon Ahead of Black Friday Sales

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: The Independent Workers' Union of Great Britain (IWGB) has filed legal claims against Rockstar Games, the group announced today, alleging that the dismissal of 31 Rockstar employees earlier this month constituted "trade union victimisation and blacklisting."
title: UK Video Game Worker Union Files Legal Claims Against GTA 6 Developer Rockstar, Alleging 'Trade Union Victimisation and Blacklisting'

author: Tom Phillips
description: New photos from the set of HBO's upcoming Harry Potter TV series have given fans their first look at the show's cast in Hogwarts robes — which have been given a makeover from the previous movies.
title: First Look at HBO Harry Potter Series' Cast in Hogwarts Robes, And Quidditch Teacher Madam Hooch

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: Battlefield 6 for PS5 is on sale for the first time at Amazon, offering a nice little discount of 10% that's dropped its price from $69.99 to $62.99.
title: Battlefield 6 Gets Its First Discount on PS5

author: Simon Cardy
description: All of the characters, locations, and references in the Super Mario Galaxy Movie trailer.
title: Everything We Spotted in The Super Mario Galaxy Movie Trailer

author: Michael Cripe
description: The Battlefield Studios team says REDSEC has plenty of time to regain lost ground with fans after the free-to-play offshoot was hit with a review-bombing campaign by Battlefield 6 players at launch.
title: Battlefield 6 Devs Respond to REDSEC Review-Bombing: ‘This Is Just the Beginning of the Experience’

author: Michael Cripe
description: Battlefield Studios is telling Battlefield 6 players to "keep your ear to the ground" when it comes to a solo queue option for REDSEC battle royale.
title: ‘Keep Your Ear to the Ground’ – Battlefield 6 Devs Hear the Cries for Battle Royale Solo Queue in REDSEC

author: Tom Marks
description: An action RPG amusement park where every ride is being run at half speed.
title: Where Winds Meet Review

author: Matt Purslow
description: Should you be playing Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 or Battlefield 6 this year? We weigh up the options offered by both to work out which one is best for you.
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 vs. Battlefield 6 – Which One Is Best for You?

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Jumanji 3 is officially in production — but, according to Dwayne Johnson, it also will be the last sequel in the series.
title: Jumanji 3 Officially in Production, Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson Confirms It Is the Last Film in the Series

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection Vol.1 for PS5 and Switch has dropped to just $20 at Best Buy ahead of Black Friday sales, allowing shoppers to save $20 on it.
title: Best Buy Has Slashed the Price of Metal Gear Solid: Master Collection Vol.1 to $20 Before Black Friday

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: The hit horror comic Exquisite Corpses is becoming a a tabletop strategy card game. Find out how you can play it for yourself right now.
title: Tiny Onion's Exquisite Corpses Transforms From Horror Comic to Card Game

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: At this morning's The Super Mario Galaxy Movie's Nintendo Direct, we were finally told who would be voicing both Rosalina, and new character Bowser Jr. Rosalina will be voiced by Brie Larson, while Benny Safdie is Bowser Jr.
title: The Super Mario Galaxy Movie's Rosalina Will Be Voiced by Brie Larson

author: Vikki Blake
description: Surprise! Arc Raiders is cutting the prices of its store cosmetics, and will refund anyone who snapped them up before the new price goes into effect tomorrow, November 13.
title: Arc Raiders Dev Drops Cosmetic Prices, Offers Refunds, and Reveals It 'Silently' Enabled Duo Prioritized Matchmaking

author: Vikki Blake
description: Arc Raiders' first major update, North Line, launches tomorrow, November 13. Here's everything you need to know.
title: Arc Raiders' First Major Update, North Line, Goes Live Tomorrow — Here's What To Expect

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Jesse Lonergan's bold, imaginative graphic novel Drome is a clear contender for the best comic book of 2025. See why in our exclusive preview.
title: See Why Drome Is a Major Contender for Best Graphic Novel of 2025

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: Tron and Tron: Legacy both recently got 4K steelbooks but sold out almost immediately. The Tron one is back in stock, so grab it soon if you want it.
title: Tron 4K Steelbook Is Back in Stock – But Probably Not for Long

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo is set to reveal the first Super Mario Galaxy Movie trailer, and make fresh casting announcements for the film.
title: The Super Mario Galaxy Movie Nintendo Direct — Updating Live

author: Chris Reed
description: Of all the many LEGO sets on the market, from a variety of price points, these are our picks for the best of the bunch.
title: 10 Best LEGO Sets in 2025

author: Chris Reed
description: Think LEGO sets are just for kids? Think again. Here are some of the best LEGO sets for adults.
title: The Best LEGO Sets for Adults in 2025

author: Tom Phillips
description: Hollywood stars Matthew McConaughey and Sir Michael Caine have licensed their voices to ElevenLabs, an AI audio company which hosts a library of celebrities — both living and dead.
title: Michael Caine Says Licensing His Voice to Matthew McConaughey-Backed AI Audio Company Is 'Using Innovation Not to Replace Humanity, But to Celebrate It'

author: Tom Phillips
description: Espresso singer Sabrina Carpenter will star in and produce a new musical movie version of Alice in Wonderland.
title: After The Success of Wicked, Sabrina Carpenter Will Star In A Musical Alice in Wonderland Movie

author: Vikki Blake
description: Arc Raiders publisher Nexon has defended the game's use of generative AI, suggesting players should "assume that every game company is now using AI."
title: Arc Raiders Publisher Defends Generative AI Use, Insists 'Every Game Company' Is Now Using It

author: Tom Phillips
description: Marvel composer and director Michael Giacchino has confirmed a sequel to black-and-white Disney+ special Werewolf By Night is coming soon.
title: Marvel's Underrated Black-And-White Disney+ Special is Getting a Sequel, Director Michael Giacchino Confirms

author: Jim Vejvoda
description: FX announced today that the FX, Hulu and Disney+ series Alien: Earth has been renewed for a second season as part of an overall new deal that FX and Disney Entertainment Television have sealed with showrunner Noah Hawley. Alien: Earth, Season 2 begins filming in London in 2026.
title: FX's Alien: Earth Renewed for Season 2

author: Eric Song
description: It's also equipped with one of the most powerful AMD mobile CPUs currently available.
title: The Decked Out Asus ROG Strix G16 RTX 5070 Ti Gaming Laptop Drops to $1,850 for Black Friday

title: Dogma Finally Has a 4K Blu-ray Release Date After 17 Years of Being in Limbo
